Topic.Title: No Stupid Ignorant Unconstitutional PC Pig Democrat Gun Control Laws!!

Message.Msg: If they try confiscating guns I believe it will cause an open insurrection. My suggestion is to NOT fight with police or military but to go talk to those mid level "liberals" that support such things and show them the error of their ways. You will have the support of many law enforcement people and military.

Message.Title: No More Arrogant Liar Fraud & Phony On The Planet...
Message.Msg: than Barack Hussein Obama! The majority of voters in America are total fools! The good news is that they will suffer for their stupidity!

Topic.Title: No Stupid Ignorant Unconstitutional PC Pig Democrat Gun Control Laws!!

Message.Msg: Screw-off you ignorant POS! Background Checks don't control guns... they control the whack jobs who might buy guns! How much do Democrat Pigs pay minions like you, kollie, for being such a stupid POS!??

Message.Title: Due to an increase
Message.Msg: in the price of ammo, do not expect a warning shot. Sorry but times are hard. Seen on the back of an RV.

Message.Title: Bigpopcomingsoon
Message.Msg: Please save this board from boring even me (and my coke bottle lenses) to death. Between you and Whojadaddy the potential for those once epic battles to resume is great. Please, beneath it all, I thought your exchanges were the essence of the truest humor!
